alert.note: Alert for Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Washington (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 11:34AM PST until January 21 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of up to two tenth of an inch. * WHERE...In Oregon, Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Oregon. In Washington, Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Washington. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions can be obtained for Oregon by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com, or for Washington by visiting online at https://wsdot.com/travel.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Washington
